*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=11.07.2018+GZ+Explicit+2nd+Purchase+04&utm_content=Explicit+2nd+Purchase+04]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
††Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Minimum purchase is required after other discounts and before tax. Enter promo code BS50OFF at checkout. Limit one redemption per account. One time use only. Discount not valid on copy paper, bottled water, ink & toner, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢.
** See full terms and conditions at www.GrandRewards.ca.
